project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password, ensuring the inclusion of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The length of the password should be configurable by the user.

task.name: Implement function to generate random password with required character sets
Allow user to specify the length of the password
Write tests for the password generation function to verify it meets requirements
Execute tests on the password generation function to ensure it works as expected
